Name: Blacksmith: Dark Times
About the game: Take on the role of a blacksmith in the castle, create weapons and sell it to the soldiers , or the army of darkness will capture the last castle , which the darkness has not yet found but closer . - Early access - 10 types of weapons. 5 kinds of metal for objects. - 12 other items to create. Don't let the oven cool down. - Buy ore, fuel, food from the merchant. - Mine the ore yourself outside the castle walls. - Upgrade ovens-buy parts and assemble boilers. - Hire a miner to bring you ore. - Don't forget to sleep , eat , drink. - Hero levels and skills. - Customer jokes. - The Board on which you leave orders. - Fishing, you can not buy food, eat fish. - Sandbox mode to the story.
